clues.clue: (I'm Joey Logano.)  In 2015 I won my first Daytona 500 after some drama: a crash with 3 laps to go & then one of these--when the green flag waves & we hit the gas again

Smoke gets in the other drivers' eyes when this champion & team owner hits the track
(I'm Brad Keselowski.)  In 2009 the first lap I ever led in a Sprint Cup race was the winning one at the Aaron's 499 in this city that's familiar to the fans of Ricky Bobby
(I'm Chase Elliott.)  In 2016 I followed in the footsteps of this NASCAR legend by taking over behind the wheel of the 24 car when he retired from a cup career that began in 1992
